name: Ostand
description:
Context

In a five-day game jam, we created an escape game with a medieval theme. Our team of twelve 2nd year undergraduate students from  Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia (IIM) has accepted the challenge.  Relive the moments prior to the viking attack on Paris with a very special narrator.

Game Jam Theme : Escape Game

Our Constraint : Medieval 

Plateform : PC

Engine : Unity

Language : French

"Brothers and sisters, today is a great day. The greatest raid our people have ever known.  I, Ragnar Lodbrok, am going to fake my death to sneak  into Paris, the capital of Francia, a city where many riches await us. We will lower the bridge from the inside to let you in, and after that, we will be rich, famous, strong, pretty and..."

"Grandpa, did he really say that ?"

" Um ...  Yes."

Summary

A grandfather tells his grandchildren about the story of Ragnar Lodbrok. You will play as the legendary viking king and relive the escape from the church before taking the city of Paris in the "historically accurate" version of the grandfather.
